Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to significantly enhance productivity and efficiency in your operations. This product has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance. Given its exceptional capabilities, I believe it would be a valuable asset to your business. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about how this product can benefit your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
